page.title: Expanded Drones
page.descr: Names and descriptions of ships added by Expanded Drones
page.t: An improved version of the standard (repair drone){20101,100201}, optimized with a more powerful engine, and additional hull plating.
An improved version of the standard (cargo drone){20101,100101}, optimized with a more powerful engine.
An improved version of the standard (building drone){20101,100301}, optimized with additional hull plating.
An improved version of the standard (defence drone){20101,100401}, optimized with a more powerful engine, additional hull plating, and upgraded weaponry.
An improved version of the standard (mining drone){20101,100501}, optimized with a more powerful engine, and additional hull plating.
(Mk2){20111,201} variant of an (All-round Engine){20107,1001} built for use exclusively on (S Drones){20111,5011}{1001,8}.
(Mk2){20111,201} variant of a (Combat Engine){20107,1201} built for use exclusively on (S Drones){20111,5011}{1001,8}.
